text:
RX Marketing Group (http://www.rxmg.com) | Los Angeles | Software Engineer | Full-Time | On-site

RXMG is a small team of marketers doing big things with big data. The engineering team needs someone who can join our team and hit the ground running. We heavily use AWS, Docker, Galera PHP7, Symfony, nginx.

Join us in our Venice Beach office on Abbott Kinney Blvd.

Send resume in an email to info@rxmg.com with subject "ATTN: joeldg"
